thread.section_title: Four Points by Sheraton Manhattan Chelsea - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good location and reasonably priced
thread.title_full: Good location and reasonably priced - Review of Four Points by Sheraton Manhattan Chelsea, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Justjhas
title: Good location and reasonably priced
text:
The bed is very comfortable, similar quality to other SPG hotels.
The standard room is average-sized (it's expected, considering it's four points and in NYC). It's a bit cramped for 3 people - but we managed.
It's perfectly located. There's a subway station few meters away from the hotel. Touristy areas are relatively near (probably around 10 blocks to Time Square) - but still far enough to have a relatively quiet neighborhood.
Free breakfast (with unlimited coffee refills) is claimed in the restaurant at the ground level - this means tip is expected. Food is OK, but I could easily get a better value breakfast around the area.
Courteous hotel staff.
